metadata.title: In Memoriam: Physicians Who Have Died of COVID-19 in the United States☆

body_text.text:
As Ajith Kannangara has pointed out, it is fitting to pay tribute to our heroic healthcare workers on the front lines who are caring for persons suffering from COVID-19. Besides giving them the honor of special cutaneous signs, I think it also important to remember those who have died by name. The following is a list of physicians, active and retired, who have perished in the United States as of May 7, 2020. It is taken from a list of over 1000 healthcare workers who have died worldwide from COVID-19.1
1)Ashraf Abdo, General Practioner, New York, New York2)Doug Bass, Medical Director, Drug and Alcohol Treatment, New York, New York3)Joseph A. Bonjiorno, Psychiatrist, St. Joseph Hospital (affiliated), Chicago, Illinois4)Lorna Breen, Emergency Department Medical Director, New York-Presbyterian Allen Hospital, New York, New York (died by suicide)5)Luis Caldera-Nieves, OB-GYN, Miami, Florida6)Ricardo Castaneda, Psychiatrist, New York, New York7)Charlie Chin Song Chen, Family Medicine/General Practitioner. Joseph P. Addabbo Family Health Center, New York, New York8)Reza Chowdhury, Internist and Infectious Diseases Physician, Westchester Medical Healthcare, Bronx, New York9)Jeannie Danker, MD, Wexner Medical Center, Columbus, Ohio10)Victor de Jesus, Pediatrician, Hospital HIMA, Caguas, Puerto Rico11)Leo Dela Cruz, Geriatric Psychiatrist, Carepoint Hospital, Jersey City, New Jersey12)Jeffrey Escher, Geriatrician, Westchester County, New York13)Orlando Espinoza, Family Practitioner, Broward County, Florida14)Jessie Ferreras, Primary Care Physician, Waldwick, New Jersey15)Chris Firlit, PGY6 Oral-Maxillofacial Surgery, Chief Resident, Detroit, Michigan (presumed)16)Louis Edouard Fontaine, Doctor, Brooklyn, New York17)Frank Gabrin, Emergency Medicine Physician, New York, New York18)Jay Galst, Ophthalmologist, New York, New York19)Michael Giuliano, Doctor, Mountainside Medical Group, Nutley, New Jersey20)James T. Goodrich, Neurosurgeon, Director of the Division of Pediatric Neurosurgery at Montefiore Health System, Professor of Clinical Neurological Surgery, Pediatrics, Plastic and Reconstructive Surgery at the Albert Einstein College of Medicine, Bronx, New York21)Harvey Hirsch, Pediatrics, CHEMED, Lakewood, New Jersey22)Alex Hsu, MD, Northwest Medical Center, Weston, Florida23)Priya Khanna, Nephrologist, Khanna Nephrology, Glen Ridge, New Jersey24)Robert Lancaster, Psychiatrist, New Orleans, Louisiana25)James Mahoney, Doctor, Pulmonary/Critical Care Medicine, University Hospital of Brooklyn/SUNY Downstate Medical Center, Brooklyn, New York26)Francis “Frankie” Molinari, Internal Medicine Physician, Clara Maass Medical Center, Belleville, New Jersey27)Nola Mae Moore, Physician, Shoreline, Washington28)John F. Murray, Pulmonary and Critical Care Physician, San Francisco General Hospital, San Francisco, California29)Angelo Patsalis, Family Physician, Henry Ford Medical Group, Detroit, Michigan30)Tomas Pattugalan, Internal Medicine Physician, Queens, New York31)Bredy Pierre-Louis, Family Medicine/General Practitioner, Brooklyn, New York32)Nisar Quraishi, Internal Medicine, Clinical Assistant Professor, NYU Langone Medical Center, New York, New York33)Mark Respler, Urologist, Brooklyn, New York34)Victor C. Rivera, Pediatrician, Langhorne, Pennsylvania35)Charlie Safley, Dermatologist, Memphis, Tennessee36)Barry Sakowitz, Doctor, Internal and Pulmonary Medicine, Paramus, New Jersey37)Elliot Samet, Pediatrician, Passaic, New Jersey38)Stephen Schwartz, Pathologist, Seattle, Washington39)Gary Sclar, Neurologist, Mount Sinai Hospital of Queens, Queens, New York40)Charles Rodney Smith, Psychiatrist, New Orleans, Louisiana41)Joshua Suzuki, OB-GYN, Seattle, Washington42)Arthur Sydeco Tayengco, Ob/Gyn, University Medical Center of Southern Nevada, Las Vegas, Nevada43)Arthur Turetsky, Doctor, Pulmonary and Critical Care, Bridgeport Hospital, Bridgeport, Connecticut44)Ronald Verrier, Trauma Surgeon, Bronx, New York45)Barry Webber, General Surgery, Mount Sinai Hospital, Queens, New York46)David Wolin, Radiologist, Mammography and Breast Imaging, Brooklyn Hospital Center, Piermont, New York47)Jesus Zambrano, Pediatrician, Mt. Sinai South Nassau, Oceanside, New York48)Jack Zoller, OB-GYN, New Orleans, Louisiana
